title: World News Headlines, Latest International News, World Breaking News - Times of India
description: World News: TOI brings the latest world news headlines, Current International breaking news world wide. In depth analysis and top news headlines world wide.

entries.title: Pakistan's law minister bats for judges from minority communities to join higher judiciary

entries.title: Iceland elects businesswoman Halla Tomasdottir as president
entries.description: Halla Tomasdottir, a businesswoman and investor, wins Iceland's presidential election, succeeding President Gudni Th. Johannesson. Iceland has a tradition of electing women to high office, with Vigdis Finbogadottir being the first democratically...

entries.title: Rescue worker dies in southern Germany floods
entries.description: A firefighter, 42, died in a rescue boat accident in Pfaffenbach an der Ilm, Bavarian town, during major flooding in southern Germany. Rescue workers evacuated hundreds as water cut off areas, prompting Chancellor Olaf Scholz and Economy Minister...

entries.title: Boeing Starliner launch scrubbed in final minutes of countdown
entries.description: The first crewed flight of Boeing's Starliner spaceship was dramatically called off Saturday with just under four minutes left on the launch countdown clock, for reasons that aren't yet clear.  Starliner is poised to become just the sixth type of...

entries.description: French police on Saturday arrested a climate activist who staged a protest attack on a priceless Claude Monet painting at the Musee d'Orsay in Paris, prosecutors said. Monet appears to be a favourite target for climate activists elsewhere, too,...

entries.description: The European Union's ambitious Green Deal, aiming for carbon neutrality by 2050, faces significant political challenges amid an energy crisis affecting voters' finances. As the EU prepares for parliamentary elections from June 6 to June 9,...
